name: ext_R4_ChargeItem
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.ChargeItem for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents ChargeItem from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ChargeItem|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R2.

element.short: Item containing charge code(s) associated with the provision of healthcare provider products
element.definition: The resource ChargeItem describes the provision of healthcare provider products for a certain patient, therefore referring not only to the product, but containing in addition details of the provision, like date, time, amounts and participating organizations and persons. Main Usage of the ChargeItem is to enable the billing process and internal cost allocation.
unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).

element.short: Item containing charge code(s) associated with the provision of healthcare provider products
element.definition: The resource ChargeItem describes the provision of healthcare provider products for a certain patient, therefore referring not only to the product, but containing in addition details of the provision, like date, time, amounts and participating organizations and persons. Main Usage of the ChargeItem is to enable the billing process and internal cost allocation.

element.short: Defining information about the code of this charge item
element.definition: References the (external) source of pricing information, rules of application for the code this ChargeItem uses.

element.short: Defining information about the code of this charge item
element.definition: References the (external) source of pricing information, rules of application for the code this ChargeItem uses.

element.short: Resource defining the code of this ChargeItem
element.definition: References the source of pricing information, rules of application for the code this ChargeItem uses.

element.short: Resource defining the code of this ChargeItem
element.definition: References the source of pricing information, rules of application for the code this ChargeItem uses.

element.short: Data type name for ChargeItem.definitionCanonical from FHIR R4
element.definition: Data type name for ChargeItem.definitionCanonical from FHIR R4

element.comment: Must be: canonical

element.short: planned | billable | not-billable | aborted | billed | entered-in-error | unknown
element.definition: The current state of the ChargeItem.
element.isModifierReason: This element is labelled as a modifier because it is a status element that contains status entered-in-error which means that the resource should not be treated as valid

element.short: planned | billable | not-billable | aborted | billed | entered-in-error | unknown
element.definition: The current state of the ChargeItem.

binding.description: Codes identifying the lifecycle stage of a ChargeItem.
